text: Sędzisław () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Marciszów, within Kamienna Góra County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. It lies approximately east of Kamienna Góra, and south-west of the regional capital Wrocław. == Gallery == File:Wikiexpedice Dolní Slezsko, Sędzisław 20.jpg|Train station File:Sędzisław (województwo dolnośląskie) (003).jpg|Street File:Sędzisław (województwo dolnośląskie) (004).jpg|Church File:Sędzisław (województwo dolnośląskie) (013).jpg|A house ==References== Category:Villages in Kamienna Góra County
title: Sędzisław, Lower Silesian Voivodeship
